instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Need clean EFI dump for 820-2375
threads.message: I got water damaged 820-2375 and the only thing left for me to repair is EFI chip which has pads eaten away, so I can't even read it to write dump to new chip. I have already searched on our forum and internet, but haven't found anything. Can I ask you to share clean dump for this board? It's 4MB size. Thanks in advance!

threads.title: Need clean EFI dump for 820-2375
threads.message:
MCP platform, no ME region there.
Any known good working BIOS should work.
Try this, however no idea if good.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aqx3Z5sYSiM-qGQbs3zo8I2Hy6OL9TPi/view?usp=sharing[/URL]

threads.title: Need clean EFI dump for 820-2375
threads.message:
Thanks for feednack.
I will mark it now as tested good.
